verses.roman:
eta kahi' sei cara 'hari' 'kṛṣṇa' gāya
hāse, kānde, nāce, gāya bāulera prāya

synonyms: eta kahi'-saying this; sei cara—that messenger; hari—Hari; kṛṣṇa—Kṛṣṇa; gāya—chants; hāse—laughs; kānde—cries; nāce—dances; gāya—sings; bāulera prāya—just like a madman.
translation: After saying this, the messenger began to chant the holy names of Hari and Kṛṣṇa. He also began to laugh and cry, dance and sing exactly like a madman.
